casebody.data:
Akerman, executrix, vs. Neel, receiver. March 31, 1883.

Proper service of the bill of exceptions must appear from an entry in dorsed upon or annexed thereto. When there is no entry whatever indorsed upon' or attached to the bill of exceptions showing service, parol statements cannot be heard in this court for the purpose of showing that service was perfected. Code, §4259; 44 Ga., 652; 45 lb., 316; 59 lb., 666; 63 15., 626.

Writ of error dismissed.
